Specimen Type: Blood (EDTA or heparinized), cerebrospinal fluid (CSF), tissue, saliva, other body fluids
Purpose: To detect and qualitatively analyze the presence of Herpes Virus 6 (HHV-6) DNA in clinical specimens using real-time PCR.
Container: EDTA or heparinized blood tube; sterile screw-capped tube for CSF; sterile container or snap-frozen vial for tissue; sealed sterile container for saliva/other fluids
Equipment: Real-time PCR thermal cycler, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, pipettes with aerosol-resistant tips, Class II biological safety cabinet
